A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a great movie and I will gladly go see it a third time. It's a shame that there is any backlash. The point of the movie is that the story is not going to be the same as the past movies (nor should it be). Kylo/Ben and Rey have flawless chemistry\, Rose adds a fresh face to the group\, Finn's character has a good development\, and who doesn't love Poe Dameron?\n\nA hint of comedy\, a splash of romantic tension\, LOTS of adventure and don't get me started on the spoilers with the throne room. WORTH SEEING!
